nodes.text: Wandering Star was a criminal syndicate led by an individual with the rank of Grand Vygoth. They worked out of Level 1313 on the planet Coruscant during the reign of the Galactic Republic. The Pau'an Zodu Onglo was connected to the syndicate, but was arrested in the year 26 BBY for aggravated assault on Level 1671 after a botched attempt to sell stolen weapons.

Lieutenant Tanivos Divo of the Coruscant Security Force discovered the connection between Onglo and Wandering Star during his investigation of the incident and included it in his casefile. Information from the case file mentioning Wandering Star was later included in a book put together by Divo's grandson Exantor Divo during the reign of the New Republic.
Wandering Star was created for the 2018 novel Last Shot, which was written by Daniel José Older.
